title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE31004 1 - 0 - 3: 3 CreditsGround calibration of aircraft instruments, CG determination of an aircraft, cruise and climb performance of an air plane, static longitudinal stability, neutral and maneuver points, lateral and directional stability, side slip, coordinated turn, phugoid, Determination of glider drag polar.
